Photos: Tropical Fuck Storm Live @ Barboza in Seattle

By Iggy Pot - September 4, 2019

Tropical Fuck Storm delivered a blistering live set at Barboza in Seattle last night and Live Eye Tv was there to catch all the action. The Australian band is currently touring in support of their Braindrops LP out now on Joyful Noise Recordings. The four-piece features guitarist/vocalist Gareth Liddiard and bassist/vocalist Fiona Kitschin, both members of the art-psych band The Drones, as well as drummer Lauren Hammel (High Tension) and guitarist/keys/vocalist Erica Dunn (Harmony / Palm Springs).

Below, you can catch photo highlights from the night and stream the band’s Braindrops LP via Bandcamp. While you’re at it, don’t miss the album standouts “Paradise” and “The Planet Of Straw Men.”
